Jells
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Jells
By Icelord13 on Tuesday, January 13, 2004 - 03:42 pm:

Another poem like my ripper one. Same amount of stanzas and sounds pretty good. Here it is is.

Jells

A nasty slime, a slippery ooze,
Tonight’s fight your sure to lose.
Jells are very good to raise,
easy to feed, easy to praise.

Metal Jell is very cool,
flattening to a metallic pool.
Jell itself is good indeed,
ready to help a breeder in need.

Senses that are very keen,
it beats you up if you are mean.
Molds itself into different things,
even beautifully crafted rings.

If you think Jells cannot fight,
you’re in for one heck of a night.
Feast your eyes, and you will discover,
the super strength my jell can uncover!

hope you liked it! -Icelord13
